ðŸŽ¯ Primary Use Case: Converting files directly on a user's device without relying on cloud services.
âœ¨ Key Features: â€¢ Local file conversion using WebAssembly â€¢ No file or file size limits â€¢ Support for 250+ file formats â€¢ Conversion settings â€¢ User-friendly interface built with Svelte
ðŸ“– Summary: VERT is a file conversion utility that performs conversions locally using WebAssembly, offering privacy and eliminating file size limits. It supports a wide range of file formats (250+) including images, audio, documents, and video, with conversion settings and a user-friendly Svelte interface.

ðŸ”¥ PyUIBuilder | JavaScript
ðŸŽ¯ Primary Use Case: Building Python GUIs with a drag-and-drop interface, simplifying the GUI development process for multiple frameworks.
âœ¨ Key Features: â€¢ GUI builder for Tkinter â€¢ GUI builder for CustomTkinter â€¢ GUI builder for Kivy â€¢ Upcoming support for PySide â€¢ Drag-and-drop interface
ðŸ“– Summary: PyUIBuilder is a Python GUI builder that aims to simplify the process of creating graphical user interfaces. It supports multiple frameworks like Tkinter, CustomTkinter, and Kivy, with PySide support planned. The tool allows users to build GUIs with a drag-and-drop interface, similar to Canva.
ðŸ”— Links: â€¢ View Project â€¢ Homepage ================ ðŸ”“ Open Source

ðŸ”¥ MicroPythonOS | Python
ðŸŽ¯ Primary Use Case: Providing a comprehensive operating system environment for microcontrollers, enabling more complex applications and system-level functionalities.
âœ¨ Key Features: â€¢ Operating system for microcontrollers â€¢ ESP32 support â€¢ Inspired by Android and iOS
ðŸ“– Summary: MicroPythonOS is a complete operating system designed for microcontrollers, particularly the ESP32. It aims to bring operating system-level functionalities, drawing inspiration from Android and iOS, to resource-constrained environments.
ðŸ”— Links: â€¢ View Project â€¢ Homepage ================ ðŸ”“ Open Source

ðŸ’¡ droidrun | Python
ðŸŽ¯ Primary Use Case: Automating device interactions on Android and iOS devices using natural language commands through LLM agents.
âœ¨ Key Features: â€¢ Control Android and iOS devices with natural language commands â€¢ Supports multiple LLM providers (OpenAI, Anthropic, Gemini, Ollama, DeepSeek) â€¢ Planning capabilities for complex multi-step tasks â€¢ Easy to use CLI with enhanced debugging features
ðŸ“– Summary: DroidRun is a framework for controlling Android and iOS devices using LLM agents, enabling automation of device interactions through natural language commands. It supports multiple LLM providers and offers features like planning capabilities, a CLI with debugging, a Python API, screenshot analysis, and execution tracing.
ðŸ”— Links: â€¢ View Project â€¢ Homepage ================ ðŸ”“ Open Source

ðŸš€ Telegram-Reporter-Tool | Python
ðŸŽ¯ Primary Use Case: Automating Telegram reporting, user management, content scraping, and marketing tasks without requiring coding expertise.
âœ¨ Key Features: â€¢ Scrape members, messages, media, and channels (including hidden members) â€¢ Add members to groups/channels automatically (with optional premium member filtering)
ðŸ“– Summary: The Telegram-Reporter-Tool is a Python-based application designed to automate various Telegram-related tasks, primarily focusing on reporting, scraping, and managing Telegram users and content. It aims to simplify these processes for users without requiring coding skills, offering features like mass reporting, member adding, content scraping, and automated messaging.

âœ¨ seedbox-lite | JavaScript
ðŸŽ¯ Primary Use Case: Streaming torrents instantly on various devices.
âœ¨ Key Features: â€¢ Instant Streaming â€¢ Password Protection â€¢ Mobile Optimized â€¢ Smart Video Player â€¢ Fast Setup
ðŸ“– Summary: SeedBox Lite is a lightweight torrent streaming application that allows users to instantly stream movies and TV shows without waiting for complete downloads. It provides a Netflix-like experience with features like password protection, mobile optimization, and a smart video player, making it easy to watch torrent content on various devices.
